text: Hey everyone, I've just joined Runway East (a flexible office space business currently in Bristol and London) as Content Marketing Manager. I'm keen to learn more about strategy and am happy to have found this group! :blush:

text:
Hey everyone, my name is Surabhi. I am a freelance content writer, mainly focusing on short form blogs and website content.
Looking forward to learn from you all and engage in interesting conversations.

text: Hello! Not all of our members are guys. In an effort to be more conscious of the language we use to address each other, why not try “Hey, folks,” or “Hey everyone” instead?

Hi everyone :wave: I'm from Portugal and work as a Content Marketing Manager at a tech recruitment startup called <http://Landing.Jobs|Landing.Jobs>. I'm super excited to be part of this community and learn from all of you. I entered this industry 2 years ago and it's been a journey of growth, learning, achievements and failures. I'm on a constant hunt for knowledge in this field and am really glad to have stumbled upon this community!

Fun fact: I've been a book worm ever since I can remember (maybe that's part of the reason why I feel in love with :sparkles:content:sparkles:) and actually have an <https://www.instagram.com/missbookster/|account> on IG where I post book reviews :nerd_face:

text: Hi everyone! :wave: I am Kinshuk. I am originally from India but I live in the Netherlands. I am the founder / CEO of Prodeasy, an idea-to-outcome product management platform for teams of all sizes. I am here to learn more about content marketing and make professional connections with content marketers and writers. Looking forward to chatting with you all!

elements.text: Hi everyone!

I am Kinshuk. I am originally from India but I live in the Netherlands. I am the founder / CEO of Prodeasy, an idea-to-outcome product management platform for teams of all sizes. I am here to learn more about content marketing and make professional connections with content marketers and writers. Looking forward to chatting with you all!

text:
Hi all, :slightly_smiling_face: I’m Growth Content Marketer at Omniscient Digital where I help produce <https://beomniscient.com/podcast/|The Long Game podcast> We interview content marketers, strategists, founders and more about the frameworks, learnings, and principles that allow them and their businesses to flourish. I also write B2B case studies. :writing_hand:

Fun facts:
•  I live in Vegas :game_die:  (would love to connect with any others in town)
• I have a 1 year old as of this week… hello, temper tantrums :sweat_smile:
• It’s on my bucket list to go to 3 Michelin star restaurants in Europe :earth_americas:
Glad to be apart of this community.

text: Big ups to BK, <@U0325G1PXFV>.

elements.text: Big ups to BK,

text: I got started a loooong time ago and needed to do a lot of “dirty work” — aka the less creative stuff, like educational “how-to” content and ebooks. Demand for story-driven content is still relatively low but as educational content has become a commodity, it is quickly becoming a the battle ground. So while I can’t offer clear direction on how to break in, I’m confident your multimedia production skills will be coveted in the coming years — especially when the talent pool is saturated with news journalism production experts.

text: Oh no worries - I was thinking about recent work if you are a copy writer or editor, I forgot to ask what your role is now… I jumped into this super path org from advice of a friend and I'm learning the different paths to take and roles within the industry.

text: Hi folks, I run my own B2B marketing strategy consulting firm and my secret weapon is content planning and creation. I work mostly with cybersecurity and technology companies. I'm the author of The Complete Guide to B2B Marketing: New Tools, Tactics, and Techniques to Compete in the Digital Economy and am working on a second line of business (online marketing courses) while I continue to work as a fractional CMO who loves to write. Happy to meet you!

elements.text: Hi folks, I run my own B2B marketing strategy consulting firm and my secret weapon is content planning and creation. I work mostly with cybersecurity and technology companies. I'm the author of The Complete Guide to B2B Marketing: New Tools, Tactics, and Techniques to Compete in the Digital Economy and am working on a second line of business (online marketing courses) while I continue to work as a fractional CMO who loves to write. Happy to meet you!

text:
Ah. I have led/managed content teams for the last 3-4 years and advised companies on content for the last 2 years. I’m currently the Director of Content Marketing at Hopin. 

I started as a video marketer and rose up the ranks as a content marketer focused on the sweet spot between demand generation and brand building.
